name: OpenCore-Desktop-Guide
description: Guide to put macOS on unsupported devices

scripts.fix-lint:default: echo Attempting to fix lint... && markdownlint '**/*.md' -f && echo Fixed successfully, please commit. || echo Fix failed!
scripts.fix-lint:win32: echo Attempting to fix lint... && markdownlint **/*.md -f && echo Fixed successfully, please commit. || echo Fix failed!
scripts.lint:default: echo Linting... && markdownlint '**/*.md' && echo Lint passed. || echo Lint failed! Please review and fix errors.
scripts.lint:win32: echo Linting... && markdownlint **/*.md && echo Lint passed. || echo Lint failed! Please review and fix errors.
scripts.lint-ci:default: echo Linting... && markdownlint '**/*.md' && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && markdownlint '**/*.md' -f && echo Fix generated successfully. Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff || echo Fix failed!)
scripts.lint-ci:win32: echo Linting... && markdownlint **/*.md && echo Lint passed. || (echo Lint failed, attempting fix... && markdownlint **/*.md -f && echo Fix generated successfully. Please apply the following diff using git apply && git diff || echo Fix failed!)
scripts.spellcheck:default: spellchecker --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-urls --dictionaries dictionary/dictionary.txt dictionary/opencorekeys.txt --files '**/*.md'  && echo Spellcheck passed. || echo Spellcheck failed! Please review and fix errors/add words to dictionary as needed.
scripts.spellcheck:win32: spellchecker --plugins spell indefinite-article repeated-words syntax-urls --dictionaries dictionary/dictionary.txt dictionary/opencorekeys.txt --files **/*.md  && echo Spellcheck passed. || echo Spellcheck failed! Please review and fix errors/add words to dictionary as needed.
scripts.test:default: npm run lint --silent; npm run spellcheck --silent
scripts.test:win32: npm run lint --silent & npm run spellcheck --silent

author: Dortania
